pages:
[["CLICK A SPECIES

",{"text":"Automech","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Are greatly resiliant to damage and knockback
+ Have saturation while standing on a redstone block
+ Have saturation and increased speed while in Omnidrome
- Are slower than other species, especially when wet"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.automech"},"color":"green"},"

",{"text":"Dweller","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Have increased mining speed
+ Have permanent night vision
- Are sensitive to bright light
- Are always hungry and are never satisfied with food"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.dweller"},"color":"dark_gray"},"

",{"text":"Enderling","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Can teleport by holding sneak and right-clicking with nothing in the offhand
+ Teleport range is greatly increased in The End
+ Chorus fruit will teleport you over a much larger spread distance than normal
+Have slightly increased block interaction range
- Will take damage from sources of water"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.enderling"},"color":"light_purple"},"

",{"text":"Faefolk","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Can jump two blocks high
+ Have increased movement speed
+ Have increased jump height and movement speed in the Faewild
+ Will passively gain small amounts of experience points over time 
- Have decreased attack damage"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.faefolk"},"color":"blue"},"

",{"text":"Frostkin","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Are more resilient to damage
+ Have immunity to Slowness, Poison, Wither, Mining Fatigue and Hunger
+ Are unaffected by the frigid colds of Glacium
+ Can survive without food 
+ Are empowered by standing in powdered snow
- Become weak and hungry while in hot climates
- Take increased damage from fire and lava"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.frostkin"},"color":"aqua"},"

",{"text":"Human","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Have Luck x5 and Hero of the Village x5 when in the Overworld
+ Have no downsides"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.human"},"color":"red"}]]

[["CLICK A SPECIES

",{"text":"Hunter","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Hunters assimilate what they eat. Eating raw food will morph you into something resembling what you ate
+ Drinking milk, honey or getting too hungry will de-morph you
- Large quantities of food are required to satisfy you each day
- Being morphed takes a considerable amount of effort and energy, making you hungrier"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.hunter"},"color":"dark_green"},"

",{"text":"Nereid","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Have permanent water breathing and night vision
+ Have increased movement speed and mining speed while underwater or in rain
+ Conduit Power will regenerate you
- Become weak and hungry while in hot climates 
- Have slightly decreased movement speed outside of water"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.nereid"},"color":"dark_blue"},"

",{"text":"Netherkin","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Have permanent fire resistance and night vision 
+ Have increased attack damage when on fire or in lava
+ Have increased attack damage in the nether 
- Will take damage from sources of water"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.netherkin"},"color":"gold"},"

",{"text":"Outlander","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Can turn invisible by sneaking
+ Can backstab entities, inflicting three times the damage when hitting an entity from behind
+ Have increased block interaction range
- Cannot turn invisible while in Sanctum
- Have Mining Fatigue while in Sanctum"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.outlander"},"color":"gray"},"

",{"text":"Realmkeeper","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Have an absorption shield that regenerates every 10 seconds 
+ Will spread the effects of eating a notch or golden apple to nearby players 
- The shield only works in illuminated areas, when you have near full health and aren't wearing a helmet"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.realmkeeper"},"color":"yellow"},"

",{"text":"Villain","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"translate":"+ Are more resilient to damage
+ Have slightly increased attack damage
+ Have slightly increased attack speed 
- Iron golems will always be hostile
- Villagers will give you Bad Omen
- Cannot be given Hero of the Village 
- Have permanent Bad Luck x10"}},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger bp.villain"},"color":"dark_red"}]]
minecraft:written_book_content.title: BOOK OF REFORGED ANCESTRY
minecraft:written_book_content.author: The Provider
